The Nasdaq Composite index, home to many tech players, had shed 3.7% by 1 p.m. ET, and Shopify tends to move in sympathy with that index, which includes peers like eBay and Amazon.

title: Newsfile - 1CM Inc. Changes OTCQB Ticker Symbol to MILFF
